original_text: In every matter of wisdom and understanding about which the king questioned them, he found them ten times better than all the magicians and enchanters in his whole kingdom.
korean_text: 왕이 그들에게 모든 일을 묻는 중에 그 지혜와 총명이 온 나라 박수와 술객보다 십 배나 나은 줄을 아니라

sentences.original_text: In every matter of wisdom and understanding
about which the king questioned them
he found them ten times better
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 열 배 더 낫다는 것을 발견했다

sentences.original_text: than all the magicians and enchanters
